GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiParagraph class.

AddText.name: AddText
AddText.description: Adds some text to the current paragraph.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text that we want to insert into the current document element.

AddPageBreak.name: AddPageBreak
AddPageBreak.description: Adds a page break and starts the next element from the next page.

AddLineBreak.name: AddLineBreak
AddLineBreak.description: Adds a line break to the current position and starts the next element from a new line.

AddColumnBreak.name: AddColumnBreak
AddColumnBreak.description: Adds a column break to the current position and starts the next element from a new column.

AddPageNumber.name: AddPageNumber
AddPageNumber.description: Inserts a number of the current document page into the paragraph.

AddPagesCount.name: AddPagesCount
AddPagesCount.description: Inserts a number of pages in the current document into the paragraph.

GetParagraphMarkTextPr.name: GetParagraphMarkTextPr
GetParagraphMarkTextPr.description: Returns the text properties of the paragraph mark which is used to mark the paragraph end. The mark can also acquire common text properties like bold, italic, underline, etc.

GetNumbering.name: GetNumbering
GetNumbering.description: Returns the numbering definition and numbering level for the numbered list.

SetNumbering.name: SetNumbering
SetNumbering.description: Specifies that the current paragraph references the numbering definition instance in the current document.

params.name: oNumberingLevel
params.description: The numbering level which will be used for assigning the numbers to the paragraph.

GetElementsCount.name: GetElementsCount
GetElementsCount.description: Returns a number of elements in the current paragraph.

GetElement.name: GetElement
GetElement.description: Returns a paragraph element using the position specified.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the element which content we want to get must be located.

RemoveElement.name: RemoveElement
RemoveElement.description: Removes an element using the position specified. If the element you remove is the last paragraph element (i.e. all the elements are removed from the paragraph), a new empty run is automatically created. If you want to add content to this run, use the {@link ApiParagraph#GetElement} method.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The element position which we want to remove from the paragraph.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Removes all the elements from the current paragraph. When all the elements are removed from the paragraph, a new empty run is automatically created. If you want to add content to this run, use the {@link ApiParagraph#GetElement} method.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Creates a paragraph copy. Ingnore comments, footnote references, complex fields.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Adds an element to the current paragraph.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the current position. Returns false if the oElement type is not supported by a paragraph.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the current element will be added. If this value is not specified, then the element will be added at the end of the current paragraph.

AddTabStop.name: AddTabStop
AddTabStop.description: Adds a tab stop to the current paragraph.

AddDrawing.name: AddDrawing
AddDrawing.description: Adds a drawing object (image, shape or chart) to the current paragraph.

params.name: oDrawing
params.description: The object which will be added to the current paragraph.

params.name: oSdt
params.description: An inline container. If undefined or null, then new class ApiInlineLvlSdt will be created and added to the paragraph.

AddComment.name: AddComment
AddComment.description: Adds a comment to the current paragraph. Please note that this paragraph must be in the document.

params.name: sText
params.description: The comment text (required).

params.name: sAuthor
params.description: The author's name (optional).

params.name: sUserId
params.description: The user ID of the comment author (optional).

params.name: sLink
params.description: The link address.

params.name: sScreenTipText
params.description: The screen tip text.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Returns a Range object that represents the part of the document contained in the specified paragraph.

params.name: Start
params.description: Start character in the current element.

params.name: End
params.description: End character in the current element.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Adds an element to the current paragraph.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the current position. Returns false if the oElement type is not supported by a paragraph.

GetLastRunWithText.name: GetLastRunWithText
GetLastRunWithText.description: Returns the last Run with text in the current paragraph.

SetBold.name: SetBold
SetBold.description: Sets the bold property to the text character.

params.name: isBold
params.description: Specifies that the contents of this paragraph are displayed bold.

SetCaps.name: SetCaps
SetCaps.description: Specifies that any lowercase characters in this paragraph are formatted for display only as their capital letter character equivalents.

params.name: isCaps
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current paragraph are displayed capitalized.

SetColor.name: SetColor
SetColor.description: Sets the text color to the current paragraph in the RGB format.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: If this parameter is set to "true", then r,g,b parameters will be ignored.

SetDoubleStrikeout.name: SetDoubleStrikeout
SetDoubleStrikeout.description: Specifies that the contents of this paragraph are displayed with two horizontal lines through each character displayed on the line.

params.name: isDoubleStrikeout
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current paragraph are displayed double struck through.

SetFontFamily.name: SetFontFamily
SetFontFamily.description: Sets all 4 font slots with the specified font family.

params.name: sFontFamily
params.description: The font family or families used for the current paragraph.

GetFontNames.name: GetFontNames
GetFontNames.description: Returns all font names from all elements inside the current paragraph.

SetFontSize.name: SetFontSize
SetFontSize.description: Sets the font size to the characters of the current paragraph.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The text size value measured in half-points (1/144 of an inch).

SetHighlight.name: SetHighlight
SetHighlight.description: Specifies a highlighting color which is applied as a background to the contents of the current paragraph.

params.name: sColor
params.description: Available highlight color.

SetItalic.name: SetItalic
SetItalic.description: Sets the italic property to the text character.

params.name: isItalic
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current paragraph are displayed italicized.

SetPosition.name: SetPosition
SetPosition.description: Specifies an amount by which text is raised or lowered for this paragraph in relation to the default baseline of the surrounding non-positioned text.

params.name: nPosition
params.description: Specifies a positive (raised text) or negative (lowered text) measurement in half-points (1/144 of an inch).

SetSmallCaps.name: SetSmallCaps
SetSmallCaps.description: Specifies that all the small letter characters in this paragraph are formatted for display only as their capital letter character equivalents which are two points smaller than the actual font size specified for this text.

params.name: isSmallCaps
params.description: Specifies if the contents of the current paragraph are displayed capitalized two points smaller or not.

SetSpacing.name: SetSpacing
SetSpacing.description: Sets the text spacing measured in twentieths of a point.

params.name: nSpacing
params.description: The value of the text spacing measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetStrikeout.name: SetStrikeout
SetStrikeout.description: Specifies that the contents of this paragraph are displayed with a single horizontal line through the center of the line.

params.name: isStrikeout
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current paragraph are displayed struck through.

SetUnderline.name: SetUnderline
SetUnderline.description: Specifies that the contents of this paragraph are displayed along with a line appearing directly below the character (less than all the spacing above and below the characters on the line).

params.name: isUnderline
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current paragraph are displayed underlined.

SetVertAlign.name: SetVertAlign
SetVertAlign.description:
Specifies the alignment which will be applied to the contents of this paragraph in relation to the default appearance of the paragraph text:

  • "baseline" - the characters in the current paragraph will be aligned by the default text baseline.
  • "subscript" - the characters in the current paragraph will be aligned below the default text baseline.
  • "superscript" - the characters in the current paragraph will be aligned above the default text baseline.

params.name: sType
params.description: The vertical alignment type applied to the text contents.

Last.name: Last
Last.description: Returns the last element of the paragraph which is not empty.

GetAllContentControls.name: GetAllContentControls
GetAllContentControls.description: Returns a collection of content control objects in the paragraph.

GetAllDrawingObjects.name: GetAllDrawingObjects
GetAllDrawingObjects.description: Returns a collection of drawing objects in the paragraph.

GetAllShapes.name: GetAllShapes
GetAllShapes.description: Returns a collection of shape objects in the paragraph.

GetAllImages.name: GetAllImages
GetAllImages.description: Returns a collection of image objects in the paragraph.

GetAllCharts.name: GetAllCharts
GetAllCharts.description: Returns a collection of chart objects in the paragraph.

GetAllOleObjects.name: GetAllOleObjects
GetAllOleObjects.description: Returns a collection of OLE objects in the paragraph.

GetParentContentControl.name: GetParentContentControl
GetParentContentControl.description: Returns a content control that contains the current paragraph.

GetParentTable.name: GetParentTable
GetParentTable.description: Returns a table that contains the current paragraph.

GetParentTableCell.name: GetParentTableCell
GetParentTableCell.description: Returns a table cell that contains the current paragraph.

params.name: oPr
params.description: The resulting string display properties.

params.name: oPr.Numbering
params.description: Defines if the resulting string will include numbering or not.

params.name: oPr.Math
params.description: Defines if the resulting string will include mathematical expressions or not.

params.name: oPr.NewLineSeparator
params.description: Defines how the line separator will be specified in the resulting string.

params.name: oPr.TabSymbol
params.description: Defines how the tab will be specified in the resulting string (does not apply to numbering).

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The paragraph text properties.

InsertInContentControl.name: InsertInContentControl
InsertInContentControl.description: Wraps the paragraph object with a rich text content control.

params.name: nType
params.description: Defines if this method returns the ApiBlockLvlSdt (nType === 1) or ApiParagraph (any value except 1) object.

InsertParagraph.name: InsertParagraph
InsertParagraph.description: Inserts a paragraph at the specified position.

params.name: paragraph
params.description: Text or paragraph.

params.name: sPosition
params.description: The position where the text or paragraph will be inserted ("before" or "after" the paragraph specified).

params.name: beRNewPara
params.description: Defines if this method returns a new paragraph (true) or the current paragraph (false).

Search.name: Search
Search.description: Searches for a scope of a paragraph object. The search results are a collection of ApiRange objects.

params.name: sText
params.description: Search string.

params.name: isMatchCase
params.description: Case sensitive or not.

WrapInMailMergeField.name: WrapInMailMergeField
WrapInMailMergeField.description: Wraps the paragraph content in a mail merge field.

AddNumberedCrossRef.name: AddNumberedCrossRef
AddNumberedCrossRef.description: Adds a numbered cross-reference to the current paragraph. Please note that this paragraph must be in the document.

params.name: sRefType
params.description: The text or numeric value of a numbered reference you want to insert.

params.name: oParaTo
params.description: The numbered paragraph to be referred to (must be in the document).

params.name: bLink
params.description: Specifies if the reference will be inserted as a hyperlink.

params.name: bAboveBelow
params.description: Specifies if the above/below words indicating the position of the reference should be included (don't used with the "text" and "aboveBelow" sRefType).

params.name: sSepWith
params.description: A number separator (used only with the "fullCtxParaNum" sRefType).

AddHeadingCrossRef.name: AddHeadingCrossRef
AddHeadingCrossRef.description: Adds a heading cross-reference to the current paragraph. Please note that this paragraph must be in the document.

params.name: sRefType
params.description: The text or numeric value of a heading reference you want to insert.

params.name: oParaTo
params.description: The heading paragraph to be referred to (must be in the document).

params.name: bLink
params.description: Specifies if the reference will be inserted as a hyperlink.

params.name: bAboveBelow
params.description: Specifies if the above/below words indicating the position of the reference should be included (don't used with the "text" and "aboveBelow" sRefType).

AddBookmarkCrossRef.name: AddBookmarkCrossRef
AddBookmarkCrossRef.description: Adds a bookmark cross-reference to the current paragraph. Please note that this paragraph must be in the document.

params.name: sRefType
params.description: The text or numeric value of a bookmark reference you want to insert.

params.name: sBookmarkName
params.description: The name of the bookmark to be referred to (must be in the document).

params.name: bLink
params.description: Specifies if the reference will be inserted as a hyperlink.

params.name: bAboveBelow
params.description: Specifies if the above/below words indicating the position of the reference should be included (don't used with the "text" and "aboveBelow" sRefType).

params.name: sSepWith
params.description: A number separator (used only with the "fullCtxParaNum" sRefType).

AddFootnoteCrossRef.name: AddFootnoteCrossRef
AddFootnoteCrossRef.description: Adds a footnote cross-reference to the current paragraph. Please note that this paragraph must be in the document.

params.name: sRefType
params.description: The text or numeric value of a footnote reference you want to insert.

params.name: oParaTo
params.description: The first paragraph from a footnote to be referred to (must be in the document).

params.name: bLink
params.description: Specifies if the reference will be inserted as a hyperlink.

params.name: bAboveBelow
params.description: Specifies if the above/below words indicating the position of the reference should be included (don't used with the "aboveBelow" sRefType).

AddEndnoteCrossRef.name: AddEndnoteCrossRef
AddEndnoteCrossRef.description: Adds an endnote cross-reference to the current paragraph. Please note that this paragraph must be in the document.

params.name: sRefType
params.description: The text or numeric value of an endnote reference you want to insert.

params.name: oParaTo
params.description: The first paragraph from an endnote to be referred to (must be in the document).

params.name: bLink
params.description: Specifies if the reference will be inserted as a hyperlink.

params.name: bAboveBelow
params.description: Specifies if the above/below words indicating the position of the reference should be included (don't used with the "aboveBelow" sRefType).

AddCaptionCrossRef.name: AddCaptionCrossRef
AddCaptionCrossRef.description: Adds a caption cross-reference to the current paragraph. Please note that this paragraph must be in the document.

params.name: sCaption
params.description: The caption label ("Equation", "Figure", "Table", or another caption label).

params.name: sRefType
params.description: The text or numeric value of a caption reference you want to insert.

params.name: oParaTo
params.description: The caption paragraph to be referred to (must be in the document).

params.name: bLink
params.description: Specifies if the reference will be inserted as a hyperlink.

params.name: bAboveBelow
params.description: Specifies if the above/below words indicating the position of the reference should be included (used only with the "pageNum" sRefType).

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiParagraph object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteNumberings
params.description: Specifies if the used numberings will be written to the JSON object or not.

params.name: bWriteStyles
params.description: Specifies if the used styles will be written to the JSON object or not.

GetPosInParent.name: GetPosInParent
GetPosInParent.description: Returns the paragraph position within its parent element.

ReplaceByElement.name: ReplaceByElement
ReplaceByElement.description: Replaces the current paragraph with a new element.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The element to replace the current paragraph with.

AddCaption.name: AddCaption
AddCaption.description: Adds a caption paragraph after (or before) the current paragraph. Please note that the current paragraph must be in the document (not in the footer/header). And if the current paragraph is placed in a shape, then a caption is added after (or before) the parent shape.

params.name: sAdditional
params.description: The additional text.

params.name: sLabel
params.description: The caption label.

params.name: bExludeLabel
params.description: Specifies whether to exclude the label from the caption.

params.name: sNumberingFormat
params.description: The possible caption numbering format.

params.name: bBefore
params.description: Specifies whether to insert the caption before the current paragraph (true) or after (false) (after/before the shape if it is placed in the shape).

params.name: nHeadingLvl
params.description: The heading level (used if you want to specify the chapter number). If you want to specify "Heading 1", then nHeadingLvl === 0 and etc.

params.name: sCaptionSep
params.description: The caption separator (used if you want to specify the chapter number).

SetSection.name: SetSection
SetSection.description: Sets the specified section to the current paragraph.

params.name: oSection
params.description: The section which will be set to the paragraph.

SetStyle.name: SetStyle
SetStyle.description: The paragraph style base method. This method is not used by itself, as it only forms the basis for the {@link ApiParagraph#SetStyle} method which sets the selected or created style for the paragraph.

params.name: oStyle
params.description: The style of the paragraph to be set.

SetContextualSpacing.name: SetContextualSpacing
SetContextualSpacing.description: Specifies that any space before or after this paragraph set using the {@link ApiParaPr#SetSpacingBefore} or {@link ApiParaPr#SetSpacingAfter} spacing element, should not be applied when the preceding and following paragraphs are of the same paragraph style, affecting the top and bottom spacing respectively.

params.name: isContextualSpacing
params.description: The true value will enable the paragraph contextual spacing.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The paragraph left side indentation value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The paragraph right side indentation value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The paragraph first line indentation value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: sJc
params.description: The justification type that will be applied to the paragraph contents.

SetKeepLines.name: SetKeepLines
SetKeepLines.description: Specifies that when rendering the document using a page view, all lines of the current paragraph are maintained on a single page whenever possible.

params.name: isKeepLines
params.description: The true value enables the option to keep lines of the paragraph on a single page.

SetKeepNext.name: SetKeepNext
SetKeepNext.description: Specifies that when rendering the document using a paginated view, the contents of the current paragraph are at least partly rendered on the same page as the following paragraph whenever possible.

params.name: isKeepNext
params.description: The true value enables the option to keep lines of the paragraph on the same page as the following paragraph.

SetPageBreakBefore.name: SetPageBreakBefore
SetPageBreakBefore.description: Specifies that when rendering the document using a paginated view, the contents of the current paragraph are rendered at the beginning of a new page in the document.

params.name: isPageBreakBefore
params.description: The true value enables the option to render the contents of the paragraph at the beginning of a new page in the document.

SetSpacingLine.name: SetSpacingLine
SetSpacingLine.description: Sets the paragraph line spacing. If the value of the sLineRule parameter is either "atLeast" or "exact", then the value of nLine will be interpreted as twentieths of a point. If the value of the sLineRule parameter is "auto", then the value of the nLine parameter will be interpreted as 240ths of a line.

params.name: nLine
params.description: The line spacing value measured either in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch) or in 240ths of a line.

params.name: sLineRule
params.description: The rule that determines the measuring units of the line spacing.

SetSpacingBefore.name: SetSpacingBefore
SetSpacingBefore.description: Sets the spacing before the current paragraph. If the value of the isBeforeAuto parameter is true, then any value of the nBefore is ignored. If isBeforeAuto parameter is not specified, then it will be interpreted as false.

params.name: nBefore
params.description: The value of the spacing before the current paragraph measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: isBeforeAuto
params.description: The true value disables the spacing before the current paragraph.

GetSpacingBefore.name: GetSpacingBefore
GetSpacingBefore.description: Returns the spacing before value of the current paragraph.

SetSpacingAfter.name: SetSpacingAfter
SetSpacingAfter.description: Sets the spacing after the current paragraph. If the value of the isAfterAuto parameter is true, then any value of the nAfter is ignored. If isAfterAuto parameter is not specified, then it will be interpreted as false.

params.name: nAfter
params.description: The value of the spacing after the current paragraph measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: isAfterAuto
params.description: The true value disables the spacing after the current paragraph.

GetSpacingAfter.name: GetSpacingAfter
GetSpacingAfter.description: Returns the spacing after value of the current paragraph.

SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specifies the shading applied to the contents of the paragraph.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type which will be applied to the contents of the current paragraph.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: The true value disables paragraph contents shading.

GetShd.name: GetShd
GetShd.description: Returns the shading applied to the contents of the paragraph.

SetBottomBorder.name: SetBottomBorder
SetBottomBorder.description: Specifies the border which will be displayed below a set of paragraphs which have the same paragraph border settings. The paragraphs of the same style going one by one are considered as a single block, so the border is added to the whole block rather than to every paragraph in this block.

params.name: sType
params.description: The border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current bottom border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset below the paragraph measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetLeftBorder.name: SetLeftBorder
SetLeftBorder.description: Specifies the border which will be displayed at the left side of the page around the specified paragraph.

params.name: sType
params.description: The border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current left border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset to the left of the paragraph measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetRightBorder.name: SetRightBorder
SetRightBorder.description: Specifies the border which will be displayed at the right side of the page around the specified paragraph.

params.name: sType
params.description: The border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current right border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset to the right of the paragraph measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTopBorder.name: SetTopBorder
SetTopBorder.description: Specifies the border which will be displayed above a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings. The paragraphs of the same style going one by one are considered as a single block, so the border is added to the whole block rather than to every paragraph in this block.

params.name: sType
params.description: The border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current top border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset above the paragraph measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetBetweenBorder.name: SetBetweenBorder
SetBetweenBorder.description: Specifies the border which will be displayed between each paragraph in a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings.

params.name: sType
params.description: The border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset between the paragraphs measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetWidowControl.name: SetWidowControl
SetWidowControl.description: Specifies whether a single line of the current paragraph will be displayed on a separate page from the remaining content at display time by moving the line onto the following page.

params.name: isWidowControl
params.description: The true value means that a single line of the current paragraph will be displayed on a separate page from the remaining content at display time by moving the line onto the following page.

SetTabs.name: SetTabs
SetTabs.description: Specifies a sequence of custom tab stops which will be used for any tab characters in the current paragraph. Warning: The lengths of aPos array and aVal array MUST BE equal to each other.

params.name: aPos
params.description: An array of the positions of custom tab stops with respect to the current page margins measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: aVal
params.description: An array of the styles of custom tab stops, which determines the behavior of the tab stop and the alignment which will be applied to text entered at the current custom tab stop.

SetNumPr.name: SetNumPr
SetNumPr.description: Specifies that the current paragraph references a numbering definition instance in the current document.

params.name: oNumPr
params.description: Specifies a numbering definition.

params.name: nLvl
params.description: Specifies a numbering level reference. If the current instance of the ApiParaPr class is direct formatting of a paragraph, then this parameter MUST BE specified. Otherwise, if the current instance of the ApiParaPr class is the part of ApiStyle properties, this parameter will be ignored.

SetBullet.name: SetBullet
SetBullet.description: Sets the bullet or numbering to the current paragraph.

params.name: oBullet
params.description: The bullet object created with the {@link Api#CreateBullet} or {@link Api#CreateNumbering} method.
